title: Check us out At Heritage Glen Townhomes
posting_body: Hi!
My name is Paige and I would love to help you with the application process to get you moved in as soon as we can!
If you click on the name of the properties it will take you to our <URL> page with virtual tours.
Listed below are the current prices for both of our properties and highlighted the units we have coming available!
Westminster Park:
1 bedroom, 1 bath apt.
home-
$950.00 - AVAILABLE IMMEDIATELY
2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1100 - AVAILABLE IMMEDIATELY
3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome - $1295
Heritage Glen:
1 bedroom, 1 bath townhome- $1025 - AVAILABLE IN AUGUST
2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1150.00 - AVAILABLE IN AUGUST
3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1275.00 - AVAILABLE IN AUGUST
3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1375.00 - AVAILABLE IN AUGUST
Gas, heat, and water are included in your monthly rent so you are only responsible for your DTE and any kind of cable, internet or streaming services you decide to get.
Qualifications:

To qualify for any one of our homes, you will need to provide proof that you gross 3 times the amount of monthly rent; have more positive than negative credit; no prior monies owed to previous landlords; and we will do a criminal background check as well.
What to Bring When You Apply:
- 4 most recent paystubs for each leaseholder
- a copy of your social security card and ID(we need this for each person over 18)
- 2 Money orders
- One for the application fee, this is $50.00 per adult (this is
nonrefundable)
- One for $50 for the reservation fee (this is returned if you are denied,
if approved it goes towards your security deposit)
If you have any questions, we are here Mon-Fri from 9a- 6p and Sat.
from 9am-4pm.
Due to Covid-19, please use our phone number and email for communication.
